name: Plugin Name: Fantastic Restaurant Menu
author: Flying Whale Lab

sections.description:
This plugin allow you to:
* Easy add/edit/sort menu items
* Use pictures to your signature dishes
* Add Multiple price options for same dish
* Mobile Friendly design
* Customize background and text color

Help and Support

Please visit http://flyingwhalelab.com/fantastic-restaurant-menu/ for help and support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the ddmin dashboard left menu -> ‘Restaurant Menus’ to create your restaurant menu.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the ddmin dashboard left menu -> ‘Restaurant Menus’ to create your restaurant menu.

short_description: Create beautiful restaurant food and drink menu for your website.
